result.markdown:
---
title: "Análise Estatística"
---

## Carregando os pacotes


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_934b3a7af7201adcf0cdfe1eb52a20c9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(remotes)
library(rnaturalearthhires)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```
:::


## Carregando os dados


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_7b4927ab4c629807dc557380a211ed02'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)

dados <- read_excel("Dados.xlsx")
```
:::


## Visualização Ngerm


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_eaa88f64b0a15000636b4a10f39b47ea'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

dados_a <- dados |> 
  mutate(trat = as.numeric(trat))

g1 <- dados_a |>
  ggplot(aes(trat, Ngerm)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.2) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", size = 0.5, color = "blue") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 5, 10, 25, 50)) +
  ylim(35, 55) +
  labs(x = "Concentração (%)", y = "Sementes germinadas") +
  theme_classic()

g1
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## ANOVA Ngerm


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_7c3dda96b7a5588fe7b62239a1473f47'}

```{.r .cell-code}
m1 <- lm(Ngerm~trat,
         data = dados)
summary(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = Ngerm ~ trat, data = dados)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-6.3505 -1.6624 -0.3593  1.3420  7.6495 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 42.79294    0.73539  58.191  < 2e-16 ***
trat        -0.08850    0.02884  -3.068  0.00396 ** 
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 3.294 on 38 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.1985,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.1774 
F-statistic: 9.413 on 1 and 38 DF,  p-value: 0.00396
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
anova(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: Ngerm
          Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value  Pr(>F)   
trat       1 102.13 102.125  9.4131 0.00396 **
Residuals 38 412.27  10.849                   
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
m1$residuals
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
         1          2          3          4          5          6          7 
 0.2070552 -5.7929448  2.2070552  7.2070552  0.2070552 -0.7929448  0.2070552 
         8          9         10         11         12         13         14 
-5.7929448 -2.3504601  5.6495399  0.6495399  7.6495399 -0.3504601 -6.3504601 
        15         16         17         18         19         20         21 
-4.3504601 -2.3504601  1.0920245  2.0920245 -1.9079755  1.0920245  1.0920245 
        22         23         24         25         26         27         28 
 5.0920245 -0.9079755  2.0920245 -1.5805215 -0.5805215 -4.5805215 -1.5805215 
        29         30         31         32         33         34         35 
 3.4194785 -1.5805215 -1.5805215  0.4194785  0.6319018 -2.3680982  2.6319018 
        36         37         38         39         40 
-0.3680982 -0.3680982 -2.3680982  4.6319018 -0.3680982 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(m1$residuals)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(performance)
check_normality(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.287).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(m1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.064).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(DHARMa)
plot(simulateResiduals(m1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
shapiro.test(m1$residuals)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Shapiro-Wilk normality test

data:  m1$residuals
W = 0.96694, p-value = 0.2867
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
bartlett.test(Ngerm~trat,
         data = dados)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Bartlett test of homogeneity of variances

data:  Ngerm by trat
Bartlett's K-squared = 7.9863, df = 4, p-value = 0.09208
```
:::
:::


## Regressão Ngerm


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_ece464973a892493da113be9fac25053'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dados2 <- dados %>% group_by(trat) %>% summarise(Ngerm = mean(Ngerm)/50*100)

quadratico <- lm(Ngerm ~ poly(trat,2, raw = T), data = dados2)

b <- summary(quadratico)

R2q <- round(b$r.squared,2)

B0q <- round(quadratico$coefficients[1],4)

B1q <- round(quadratico$coefficients[2],4)

B2q <- round(quadratico$coefficients[3],4)

equacao2 <- paste(B2q,"x²", "+", "(", B1q, ")","x", "+", B0q)

grafico2 <- ggplot(data = dados2,aes(x = trat, y = Ngerm))+
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x,2,raw = T)) +
  theme_classic() + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 35, y = 100, label = paste("y =", equacao2)) + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 25.5, y = 98, label = paste("R² =", R2q)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,50,5))+
  labs(x = "Concentração (%)", y = "Taxa de Germinação (%)")
  
grafico2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
r <- sqrt(R2q)
```
:::


## Visualização Nmort


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_f95e68083fa4b88c9af9e5604f8e954f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

dados_b <- dados |> 
  mutate(trat = as.numeric(trat))

g2 <- dados_b |>
  ggplot(aes(trat, Nmort)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.2)+
       stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", size = 0.5, color = "blue") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 5, 10, 25, 50))+
  ylim(0,15) +
  labs(x = "Concentração", y = "Sementes mortas")+
  theme_classic()
g2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## ANOVA Nmort


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_2a34b53331fe55009a07acc0f913e10a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
m2 <- lm(Nmort~trat,

summary(m2)
```

```
Call:

Residual standard error: 3.066 on 38 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.1937,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.1725 
F-statistic:  9.13 on 1 and 38 DF,  p-value: 0.004481
```

## Regressão Nmort


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_e67571c863c673e14815a0e184ecb1a7'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dados3 <- dados %>% group_by(trat) %>% summarise(Nmort = mean(Nmort)/50*100)

quadratico3 <- lm(Nmort ~ poly(trat,2, raw = T), data = dados3)

b <- summary(quadratico3)

R2q <- round(b$r.squared,2)

B0q <- round(quadratico3$coefficients[1],2)

B1q <- round(quadratico3$coefficients[2],2)

B2q <- round(quadratico3$coefficients[3],4)

equacao3 <- paste("(", B2q, ")", "x²", "+", B1q,"x", "+", B0q)

grafico3 <- ggplot(data = dados3,aes(x = trat, y = Nmort))+
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x,2,raw = T)) +
  theme_classic() + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 10, y = 25, label = paste("y =", equacao3)) + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 10, y = 23, label = paste("R² =", R2q))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,50,5))+
  labs(x = "Concentração (%)", y = "Taxa de Mortalidade (%)")
  
grafico3
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
r <- sqrt(R2q)
```
:::


## Visualização IVG


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_e8789db36b4ad2e73704213e7efc46f8'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

dados_c <- dados |> 
  mutate(trat = as.numeric(trat))

g3 <- dados_c |>
  ggplot(aes(trat, IVG)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.2)+
        stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", size = 0.5, color = "blue") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 5, 10, 25, 50))+
  ylim(10,18) +  
 labs(x = "Concentração (%)", y = "IVG (%)")+
  theme_classic()
g3
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## ANOVA IVG


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_238399e98a6de952ad27bb88b7570147'}

## Regressão IVG


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_b3ffff8e3a86922c717544a35bf9c2dc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dados4 <- dados %>% group_by(trat) %>% summarise(IVG = mean(IVG))
quadratico4 <- lm(IVG ~ poly(trat,2, raw = T), data = dados4)

b <- summary(quadratico4)

R2q <- round(b$r.squared,2)

B0q <- round(quadratico4$coefficients[1],2)

B1q <- round(quadratico4$coefficients[2],2)

B2q <- round(quadratico4$coefficients[3],4)

equacao4 <- paste(B2q,"x²", "+", "(", B1q, ")","x", "+", B0q)

grafico4 <- ggplot(data = dados4,aes(x = trat, y = IVG))+
  geom_point()+ 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x,2,raw = T)) +
  theme_classic() + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 35, y = 19, label = paste("y =", equacao4)) + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 35, y = 18, label = paste("R² =", R2q))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,50,5))+
  labs(x = "Concentração (%)", y = "IVG (%)")
  
  
grafico4
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
r <- sqrt(R2q)
```
:::


## Visualização MS


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_51530a7c098701bfcccd625d54344ba2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

dados_d <- dados |> 
  mutate(trat = as.numeric(trat))

# Criar o gráfico
g4 <- dados_d |>
  ggplot(aes(trat,MS )) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.2)+
         stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", size = 0.5, color = "blue")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 5, 10, 25, 50))+
  ylim(0,0.015) +  
  labs(x = "Concentração (%)", y = "Massa Seca")+
  theme_classic()
g4
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

```
 0.0012806748 -0.0007193252  0.0002806748 -0.0027193252 -0.0017193252
```

```

	Shapiro-Wilk normality test

data:  m4$residuals
W = 0.965, p-value = 0.2473
```

```{.r .cell-code}
bartlett.test(MS~trat,
         data = dados)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Bartlett test of homogeneity of variances

data:  MS by trat
Bartlett's K-squared = 1.8232, df = 4, p-value = 0.7682
```
:::
:::


## Regressão MS


::: {.cell hash='arquivo2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_64683d617033cb80c4770fa78ea9edfd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dados5 <- dados %>% group_by(trat) %>% summarise(MS = mean(MS))
quadratico5 <- lm(MS ~ poly(trat,2, raw = T), data = dados5)

b <- summary(quadratico5)

R2q <- round(b$r.squared,2)

B0q <- round(quadratico5$coefficients[1],4)

B1q <- round(quadratico5$coefficients[2],4)

B2q <- round(quadratico5$coefficients[3],6)

equacao5 <- paste("(", B2q, ")", "x²", "+", B1q,"x", "+", B0q)

grafico5 <- ggplot(data = dados5,aes(x = trat, y = MS))+
  geom_point()+ 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x,2,raw = T)) +
  theme_classic() + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 35, y = 0.01, label = paste("y =", equacao5)) + 
  annotate(geom = "text", x = 35, y = 0.0095, label = paste("R² =", R2q))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,50,5))+
  labs(x = "Concentração (%)", y = "Massa Seca (g)")
  
grafico5
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](arquivo2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
r <- sqrt(R2q)
```
:::
